JoinRequestDialog.title: Nimwifatanye n'icumba
JoinRequestDialog.inviteOnly: Ico ni icumba c’ibanga kandi gisaba ubutumire kugira ngo umuntu yinjire .
JoinRequestDialog.knockRequired: Ico cumba gisaba ko umuntu asabwa kwinjira. Fyonda kuri buto iri musi kugira ngo wohereze igisabwa co kwinjira
JoinRequestDialog.canJoin: Iyi ni icumba ca bose, ushobora kwifatanya n'abandi

MessageList.noMessages: Nta butumwa n’ubu, wohereze ubutumwa bwa mbere kugira ngo utangure ikiyago!

MessageVirturalList.noMessages: Nta butumwa n’ubu, wohereze ubutumwa bwa mbere kugira ngo utangure ikiyago!
